ud3.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud3.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sariputto bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
ud3.4:1.4: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam sariputtam avidure nisinnam pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
ud3.4:2.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
